summary: Does Medicare pay when beneficiaries use two-way video visits to get care from their doctors? It depends. Medicare pays for some two-way video visits—referred to as "telehealth"—if the patients connect from rural health facilities. title: Health Care: Telehealth and Remote Patient Monitoring Use in Medicare and Selected Federal Programs
